review: This fire stick is great my wife loves it I might have to buy another one so I can watch it on my tv.
author: thomas

review: Awesome! Just what I thought it would be and more. This is all I have I don't even pay for cable. You don't need it with this!
author: Heather McDowell

review: not as many titles as nf...does not support dolby digital (NO SURROUND SOUND)...unable to give it a thorough test though because my prime 2 day order back ordered my fire by 3 weeks.
author: sarah clausen

review: The fire stick is great!  I first plugged it into my TV but  The only sound was through the TV. When I plugged it into my receiver with HDMI  plug it finally had all my surroundsound yeah!  I simply love it ! great value for the money and no wires
author: Debbie In CT

review: Thank you I love my new stick no more bleeping out at my videos that I watching
author: debbinwa

review: Love that I can take it with me anywhere in my house!
author: Kristina R Arbic

review: So easy to use, and great to take when you travel. Saves me from having to use my game console.
author: Jennifer Villanueva

review: This is a great interface. It has a ton of apps to choose from and it has all my amazon streaming needs met. I wish it had Youtube on it as well. I can't wait for HBO Now to be added too. I like this so much that i plan on having one added to my bedroom so i can be entertained as well!
author: Megan
